death.attack.ess_requiem.bone_claw: %1$s was ripped into tiny small pieces by %2$s
death.attack.ess_requiem.decaying_will: %1$s felt the might of %2$s's decaying power
death.attack.ess_requiem.hopping_skull: %1$s had their skull bashed in by %2$s's summoned skulls
death.attack.ess_requiem.skull_mass: %1$s was reduced to a pile of bone meal by %2$s's skull mass
item.ess_requiem.nameless_ring.desc: The ring of an unnamed king. You feel the power of decay within.
spell.ess_requiem.a_moment_in_time.guide: Using mental energy, pause your current state, preventing death once.
spell.ess_requiem.boiling_blood.guide: Boil a targets blood, dealing damage and setting them aflame. Targets with boiled blood find their mana regeneration compromised, and a weakness to blood.
spell.ess_requiem.corpse_explosion.guide: Violently explode the body of a summoned creature, obliterating it, and leaving a toxic puddle of blood behind.
spell.ess_requiem.decaying_will.guide: Call upon decay itself to rebuild your summons should they fall using mana, as well as summoning an initial burst of powerful withering energy. Tales say a certain ring could stop you from decaying when using this spell.
spell.ess_requiem.ebony_armor.guide: Take on cursed Ebony Plating upon your body, enhancing all your physical aspects to the supreme. However, the plates shackle your spell casting, preventing it in full.
spell.ess_requiem.necrotic_burst.guide: Release a burst of withering energy, empowered by the souls of the dead, damage and wither things around you in a radius.
spell.ess_requiem.overload.guide: Project your chaotic and endless thoughts into a targets mind, damaging and confusing them. Being confused causes them to hit themselves when they attack.
spell.ess_requiem.pact_of_the_dead.guide: A vile pact with an undead long dead. During the night, imbue your attacks with a violent and powerful rampage, and during the day, wither and burn for your atrocities.
spell.ess_requiem.protection_of_the_fall: Call upon ancient spirits to protect you from harm. Uses mana to reduce oncoming damage, and retaliates against attackers using sharp purple spikes.
spell.ess_requiem.reaper.guide: Temporarily become a reaper, when your summons perish, harvest their souls to regain mana.
spell.ess_requiem.rip_and_tear.guide: Enhance one of your arms, allowing fingers to become razor sharp claws, and while under a rampage, the souls of the dead fill your claws with strength. Your claws will not come out if there is an item in the way.
spell.ess_requiem.strain.guide: Strain your muscles, pushing your body to it's limit to enhance blood spell power. Power is not without cost, and you lose max HP casting this spell.
spell.ess_requiem.summon_skulls.guide: Summon Cursed Skulls from nothingness that will cast spells at your foes. The skulls aren't the best at holding themselves up with magic, and will fall or drag themselves across the ground on occasion. While under a rampage, summon a singular, high flying, stronger skull.
spell.ess_requiem.to_stand_before_me.gui: Channel your mind and unleash waves of mental energy, dramatically slowing down all they touch, as well as slowly hitting them with mental waves.
spell.ess_requiem.weight_of_the_world.gu: Unleash powerful mental energy, sending everything around you skyrocketing into the air.
spell.ess_requiem.wretch.guide: Spew magical blood forth from your body, dealing damage. When low HP, switch damage to Desperation Damage, doing more damage.
ui.enders_spells.not_empty_hand: You try and flex your claws, yet something's in the way.
